name: Mina Bright
description: Well, I’m a Major General of the US Army. i’m currently deployed to syria for UN peace keeping mission.. I have been here for almost 6 months now. hoping to finish my mission soon and return back to the New York City. I am widower with 1 son. he is 14years old. my wife died of lung cancer 3years ago.so i am single right now. I am 50years old.
